SELECT CEIL(A1.TOT_CNT / #{gridRow}) AS TOT_PAGE , #{gridPage} AS GRID_PAGE , #{gridRow} AS GRID_ROW , TOT_CNT , LOGIN_ID , USER_NM , EMP_NO , ADDR , FRONT_REG_NO , GENDER , EMAIL , TEL_NUM , EMER_TEL_NUM , ENTR_DT , RESING_DT , DEPT_CD , GRADE_CD , LVL_EDU , MAJOR , MARR_YN , SAL_CLAS , FST_REG_DTTM , FST_RGST_EMP_NO , LST_CHG_DTTM , LST_CHG_EMP_NO FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , COUNT(1) OVER() AS TOT_CNT , LOGIN_ID , USER_NM , EMP_NO , ADDR , FRONT_REG_NO , GENDER , EMAIL , TEL_NUM , EMER_TEL_NUM , ENTR_DT , RESING_DT , DEPT_CD , GRADE_CD , LVL_EDU , MAJOR , MARR_YN , SAL_CLAS , FST_REG_DTTM , FST_RGST_EMP_NO , LST_CHG_DTTM , LST_CHG_EMP_NO FROM TB_I1000 WHERE 1 = 1
AND USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{userNm} || '%'
AND LOGIN_ID LIKE '%' || #{loginId} || '%'
AND ENTR_DT BETWEEN #{entrDt1} AND #{entrDt2}
ORDER BY EMP_NO ) A1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND A1.RN BETWEEN #{gridPage} * #{gridRow} + 1 and #{gridPage} * #{gridRow} + #{gridRow} + 1

SELECT A.EMP_NO , B.USER_NM , A.LVL_EDU , A.MAJOR , A.DOBL_MAJOR FROM TB_I2000 A , TB_I1000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO
AND A.EMP_NO LIKE '%' || #{empNo} || '%'
AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{userNm} || '%'
SELECT A.EMP_NO , B.USER_NM , B.COMP_NM , B.CLIENT_COMP_NM , B.PROJ_TITLE , B.START_DT , B.END_DT , B.ASSIGN_TASK FROM TB_I1000 A , TB_I3000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO
SELECT A.EMP_NO , B.USER_NM , A.CERTF_TITLE , A.CERTF_DT FROM TB_I4000 A , TB_I1000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO
